body_html: Hi Tony, It is not merged yet, as we are handling other concat related issues (e.g. empty tensor with ndims=0 as input). I will let you when we are ready for public PR. Thanks, GZ From: Tony Reina [mailto:notifications@github.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2018 5:06 PM To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com> Cc: Zhuang, Guozhong <guozhong.zhuang@intel.com>; Comment <comment@noreply.github.com> Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] TF1.6 MKL bug in concatenation op (#17494) I still see the bug in 1.7 and the 1.8 rc1. Can you confirm that the fix has been merged into those? Thanks. -Tony — You are receiving this because you commented. body_text:
Hi Tony,

It is not merged yet, as we are handling other concat related issues (e.g. empty tensor with ndims=0 as input).
I will let you when we are ready for public PR.

Thanks,
GZ

From: Tony Reina [mailto:notifications@github.com]
Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2018 5:06 PM
To: tensorflow/tensorflow <tensorflow@noreply.github.com>
Cc: Zhuang, Guozhong <guozhong.zhuang@intel.com>; Comment <comment@noreply.github.com>
Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] TF1.6 MKL bug in concatenation op (#17494)


I still see the bug in 1.7 and the 1.8 rc1. Can you confirm that the fix has been merged into those?

Thanks.
-Tony

body:
Hi Tony,

It is not merged yet, as we are handling other concat related issues (e.g. empty tensor with ndims=0 as input).
I will let you when we are ready for public PR.

Thanks,
GZ

From: Tony Reina [mailto:notifications@github.com]

Subject: Re: [tensorflow/tensorflow] TF1.6 MKL bug in concatenation op (#17494)


I still see the bug in 1.7 and the 1.8 rc1. Can you confirm that the fix has been merged into those?

Thanks.
-Tony
